name: Otto the Combo Butler
description:
Play as Otto the Combo Butler, an Alexa like robot with the ability to move freely around an apartment complex helping the tenants. Combine two items each matching one of their specified wishes to merge them into an object of their desire!

2018 Unity

Temi Olujobi, Isabella Djurovic, Rachel Moeller, Avery Holmes, Kris Atanasoski
